Package com.ansi.scilla.report.reportBuilder.reportType

Class PrintableReport

java.lang.Object
com.ansi.scilla.common.ApplicationObject
com.ansi.scilla.report.reportBuilder.reportType.ReportBuilder
com.ansi.scilla.report.reportBuilder.reportType.PrintableReport
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractPDFBuilder, AbstractXLSBuilder
public abstract class PrintableReport
extends ReportBuilder
A common place to hold print-only values and methods. (ie. for XLS and PDF builders)
